title: MCL.io

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: First of all, I wish to welcome you to the bitcointalk forum, and I just checked the site given by your forum username @ "MCL.io" and what I saw is totally different from what you claim to offer here on the forum. As from what I saw, it states that "This premium domain name is available for purchase". Check below..Or, please can you elaborate more on this by providing the necessary url for your MCL official website and MCL Gaming Casino for us to check out, and see if we will love to use your casino..

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: I don't know what's going on with op but it seems I can't access the given link by op and I also tried the website as it is what op used as a username here in the forum and the topic is also about MCL yet still the same as what the images shown above. I can only say that it is a waste of time in my opinion since there's nothing I can check or see. I can only ask and search more about MCL that op posted. I wonder why op used that three letters as the name and I can also remember mobile legend's MCL.

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: MCL.io on January 27, 2023, 08:34:36 PMQuote from: CryptoHeadlineNews on January 27, 2023, 08:20:06 PMThe MCL official website is https://www.mcl-token.io/ We hope you will enjoy our gaming experience and take advantage of our hundreds of exciting games, big jackpots, and generous promotions.^Interesting gambling casino upon checking it, yeah it is very generous about the promotion, there is a faucet, chat rain, and a free bonus upon signing up, which is I think a lot. Probably I am afraid that it can be abused in the future, is there a way to filter this kind of activity in the future if there is someone abuse the promotion?However, let me greet you first, welcome to the forum one of the biggest gambling communities, speaking of generosity, would you like to run here a signature campaign that is I think more effective? Though I saw some little bugs, but all went well and I think you will become successful here.

comments.author: RILWAN
comments.body: Welcome onboard first get yourself a copper member account so that you can display images and other graphic content but in between, its good to see that you are here to promote your platform as there are several other casinos that offer similar games like yours so you need to put in more effort to promote the casino.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: i remember i seem to have made replies in your thread this 3x.please pay attention to the replies by other members. if indeed you intend and are serious about marketing your gambling project, you better buy a copper member to get a limit on posting pictures. so you can make detailed posts and images that attract investors or gamblers to join your project.and if you are not good at managing your marketing on this forum, you can hire from some trusted members here to market your project promotion more interesting and better than you have to make thread several times.lots of trusted members here like @Royse777  @yahoo62278 for you to hire as your project marketing design.for your project, looks like your gambling platform only uses your own native token MCD, do you intend to add other crypto like bitcoin, ethereum, USDT etc ? because usually gamblers prefer to bet using their own favorite coins.

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: Welcome to the forum. I check your website and I saw the information that says your casino was duly filed in accordance with New Jersey State Law and was assigned Certificate Number: 4193389581. Does this mean you're licensed with the US or you just allow to provide service for the US customer?You also claim to be an anonymous casino. Is this a forever thing cause we have seen some casinos that started through anonymous service and later request KYC?In the meantime, you need to create a marketable ANN thread. You also establish your brand on this forum through a signature advertisement campaign and I will be glad to help with that. PM me for an insightful talk per the advertisement.
